articles.author: Amanda Chu, Harry Dempsey, Jim Pickard
articles.title: Cyber watchdogs warn on phishing scams as IT outage fallout lingers - Financial Times
articles.description: Airlines and healthcare services are among the hardest hit by the faulty CrowdStrike update
articles.content: Global cyber security watchdogs have raised the alarm over malicious websites claiming to fix glitches in the wake of one of the worlds biggest IT outages that was still causing disruption over the w… [+4966 chars]

articles.author: Tasos Vossos, Olivia Raimonde
articles.title: Trump Trade Sees Investors Snap Up Junk Debt and Industrials - Bloomberg
articles.description: The credit world’s version of the “Trump trade” is beginning to take shape: Buy American high-yield bonds and steer clear of anything inflation-sensitive.
